hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 76 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
Kajal let's find out what it means and
how you can use it in your daily
conversation Kajal sometimes you gently
and repeatedly appeal to someone to do
something even though they don't want to
do it the word Kajal basically means to
persuade someone to do something that
they really don't want to do when you
make someone do what you want them to do
either by talking nicely or by
persuading them in a pleasing manner it
means you are cajoling them at times you
actually persuade someone by giving
insincere compliments or by making false
promises for example you could roll your
parents to buy you a motorbike or a
gadget for your birthday
so you persuade them by pleading and
saying nice things to them and by
promising to do better at studies as the
word Kajal shows the action of
persuading it is a verb okay now that
you know what Kajal means let's take a
look at some example sentences to see
how you can use it in your daily
conversation
example one Michelle cajones her rich
friend into lending her some money which
she never paid back example two at work
mary cajoled William into helping her
make the sales presentation as she knew
about his great presentation skills
example three Ben cajoled his mother for
extra pocket money this month as he had
started saving for his friends surprise
birthday party example for Samantha
cajoled her husband to sell his
ancestral property so they could buy a
huge villa
besides the beach example five after a
serious health warning given by the
doctor Jennifer finally cajoled her
father to stop smoking example six Maria
told her husband
you can't cajole me into doing your
chores while you sit and watch the final
soccer match example 7 as Sheila's
husband was in a persuasive and
favourable mood she succeeded in
cajoling him to buy her a diamonds
necklace for their anniversary
example 8 the father had to cajole his
son into doing his homework by promising
that he would take him to watch the
baseball game example 9 as shamone had
exhausted all her vacation leaves she
had to cajole her boss to give her a few
extra paid leaves for her sister's
wedding example 10 the doctor cajoled
little mink into taking an injection by
telling her what a brave girl she was
that's the end of today's episode has
anyone never cajoled you to do something
and how did you react to it kindly share
your experiences in the comment box
below this video thank you for watching
